articles.title: Kevin Spacey Accuser’s Estate Drops Sexual Assault Lawsuit
articles.description: A Los Angeles County massage therapist, who died in September, had accused Mr. Spacey of groping him and making improper advances during a 2016 massage.
articles.content:
A lawyer for the estate of the massage therapist, a Los Angeles County man identified in the lawsuit as John Doe, did not immediately respond to a request for comment on Tuesday evening.
The massage therapist sued Mr. Spacey, 60, last January. He accused Mr.… [+856 chars]

articles.author: Michael Roston
articles.title: Rocket Launches, Trips to Mars and More 2020 Space and Astronomy Events
articles.description: A year full of highs and lows in space just ended, and the 12 months to come  will be full of new highlights in orbit and beyond.
articles.content:
Roughly every two years, the orbits of Earth and Mars come closer than usual. Space agencies on Earth often send missions to the red planet during that window, and in 2020 four such launches are scheduled.
Three of the missions will carry rovers. The United … [+970 chars]

articles.author: Nicholas St. Fleur
articles.title: Meteor Showers in 2020 That Will Light Up Night Skies
articles.description: All year long, Earth passes through streams of cosmic debris. Here’s a list of major meteor showers and how to spot one.
articles.content:
All year long as Earth revolves around the sun, it passes through streams of cosmic debris. The resulting meteor showers can light up night skies from dusk to dawn, and if youre lucky you might be able to catch one.
If you spot a meteor shower, what youre re… [+1115 chars]

articles.author: Elaine Yu
articles.title: Hong Kong Protest: Thousands Expected to March on New Year’s Day
articles.description: A holiday tradition in Hong Kong — a pro-democracy rally — could inject new momentum into the protest movement after weeks of calm.
articles.content:
The march is expected to begin at 2 p.m. The police have approved a two-mile route that passes some of the citys most iconic landmarks and buildings, stretching from Victoria Park to the Central business district. 
On New Years Day, we need to show our solid… [+735 chars]

articles.title: Hospitals and Schools Are Being Bombed in Syria. A U.N. Inquiry Is Limited. We Took a Deeper Look. - The New York Times

The bombs smashed into a child care center, a refugee camp and a school. They destroyed makeshift clinics and hospitals, disabling essential services for tens of thousands of people.

Public health experts were pleased that the flavors most alluring to youths were prohibited, but feared teenagers would switch to menthol rather than quit vaping.
